document.full_text: having suffered an ill-timed leg injury at the australian open in january, rafa nadal is reluctant to look too far ahead for the rest of this season.
document.title: nadal keeps goals short-term after early season injury
lines_and_colors: having suffered an ill-timed leg injury at the australian open in january, rafa nadal is reluctant to look too far ahead for the rest of this season.
